summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for Gratitude America, Ltd. for the month of May 2016. It includes information on account balances, deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting the financial activity during this period.

persons.name: Paul Nionis
persons.context: Paul Nionis is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Gratitude America, Ltd.
The statement covers transactions from May 1, 2016, to May 31, 2016.
The beginning balance was $176,020.01, and the ending balance was $176,034.96.
Interest earned during this period was $14.95.
No overdraft fees or NSF return item fees were incurred during this statement period.
